title: Square Meals
description: A high-end catering business focused on quality ingredients and great customer service
richtext:
Square Meals is a catering business based out of Brooklyn, NY. Their brand promise is to focus on market-fresh, high-quality ingredients for meals that are made daily and delivered to your home or office.
